General.Name: Hotel Mandarine Regency Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Hotel Mandarine Regency Tbk provides club membership services in Indonesia. It operates through Food and Beverages, Room, GVC Club Memberships, Fitness Center, Other Department, and Others segments. The company was formerly known as PT Hotel Batam Jaya and changed its name to PT Hotel Mandarine Regency Tbk in November 1997. PT Hotel Mandarine Regency Tbk was founded in 1986 and is based in Batam, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Imam Bonjol No. 1, Batam, Indonesia, 29432
